name: Flight to Paradise
description:
A short game for Mini Jam 99, where blue birds try to fly their way to freedom through a labyrinth of gigantic sawblades. Though many of them won't make it, their desire for freedom shall be passed on in a perilous relay.

Feel free to share your records (time and score) in the comments below!

This game only uses the keyboard (WASD or Arrow keys + spacebar).

Credits
  • Design & Development : ChocolaMint
  • Free Assets :
    • PantherOne : Animated bird model
    • Master484 : Bullets
    • kenney.nl : Particle graphics, fonts
    • Nido : Turrets
    • LarryIRL : Sawblades
    • Marta Nowaczyk : Cages
    • KIIRA : Death SFX
    • mixkit.co : Ending BGM (Sea coast breaking waves)

    • Ucchii0-うっちーぜろ : Main BGM (あの先へ行こうか)

Scoring Information

Here are some notes for the people who want to achieve high scores:

  • You get score based on your progress in the game. Finishing the game gives you a minimum of 10000 points.
  • Each nimbus (white blobs) gives 100 points.
  • To maximize the time bonus (10000 points), you must finish in less than 110 seconds.
  • The sawblade patterns are predictable based on your start time, so some good planning can optimize your run even further.
